name: Shanghai Private One-Day Tours
description:
Where old meets new, where east meets west: Shanghai dazzles with a fast-growing economy and modern metropolis while still preserving its rich heritage sites. Explore the cosmopolitan city with Shanghai tours including guided tours, day trips, night tours, hop-on hop-off tours and multi-day packages.
This is a one day tour in Shanghai including some of Shanghai's most visited and essential attractions. Organizers have carved out these spots for visitors which enable them to perceive, if not comprehend, the whole of Shanghai.
